 Very few citizens actually leave their homes armed and conduct themselves in public with a gun and those that do are complying with a myriad of laws controlling their actions and requiring licenses and permits. 
 
 By and large it is only criminals and law enforcement who go about their public business armed.  Now that leaves criminals . . . But you are not focused on them either because the premise of your question is that new restrictions on ownership and use of guns will finally make you feel safe . . . Ergo, the class of people who make you feel unsafe are the class of people who would comply with your desired restrictions on the ownership and use of firearms . . .
